Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.util

Contains utility code used by the other packages in this application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Progress Interface for objects that monitor progress
 

Class Summary
ByteBufferUtils Some utils and other wibble for buffers
DummyProgress A dummy implementation of the progress interface that does nothing but implement the methods with empty actions.
TreeMapMulti This class represents a data structure from the original code, a map that can hold multiple copies of the same value.
